function.name: Binding Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE GDP plugin when the binding operation completes. If status is ::EMBER_SUCCESS, binding was successful and pairingIndex indicates the index in the pairing table for the remote node.

arg.name: status
arg.description: The status of the binding operation.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the pairing entry.
